entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Blowing snow. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Blowing snow at times. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
